name: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
overview: Quintessential reality star couples are forced to face their personal demons in an extreme relationship boot camp, hoping to fix their broken unions. Raw, unbridled truth ensues when they are pushed to their emotional and physical limits to see if their relationships are worth saving or they should pull the plug.

episodes.name: The Ambush
episodes.overview: Couples who became famous on reality TV deal with issues in their relationships by going through a series of challenges, beginning in the series premiere, which finds the five duos facing media scrutiny after their dirty laundry is aired out during a surprise press conference.

episodes.name: Ring of Fire
episodes.overview: The constant bickering between Tanisha and Clive becomes a distraction to the other boot campers as they confront their most difficult relationship issues and come to terms with how hard they are willing to fight for their marriages.

episodes.name: The Morgue
episodes.overview: The stars refuse to participate in a communication drill.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: The reality stars are forced to acknowledge their character flaws and bad traits and not everyone can handle the truth.

episodes.name: Daters and Traitors
episodes.overview: The reality stars swap spouses and go on a date night.

episodes.name: Sex and the Secret
episodes.overview: The reality stars get a lesson in communication in the bedroom.

episodes.name: Fate Comes Knocking
episodes.overview: The stars come face-to-face with some tough decisions and must confront their past.

episodes.name: Proposal or Disposal
episodes.overview: In the Season Finale the reality stars are told to be honest and truthful when taking a lie detector test.

episodes.name: House of Lies
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, the reality stars arrive to their new digs and reveal the problems that have brought them there.

episodes.name: Death and Divorce Court
episodes.overview: The reality stars face their worst nightmares; and "Divorce Court" host Judge Lynn Toler offers advice to the couples on the show.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect Revenge
episodes.overview: The reality stars participate in a wife swap challenge, which leaves Natalie feeling jealous when Jacob takes Heidi on a "date."

episodes.name: Shock It To Me
episodes.overview: Tensions run high at the house; and the couples undergo shock therapy to learn how to communicate.

episodes.name: Lust or Bust
episodes.overview: The Carrolls challenge the couples to get in touch with their intimacy issues by making sex tapes using puppets.

episodes.name: The Exorcism
episodes.overview: The men find themselves in tears as emotions run high; and Syleena deals with hurtful comments during a reunion with her father.

episodes.name: Let Them Eat Cake
episodes.overview: A food fight spirals out of control when Aviva wrongly accuses Natalie of hitting her; and Rachel is crushed when Tyson makes a move that seems to indicate their relationship is on a dead-end path.

episodes.name: Deception Indicated
episodes.overview: The reality stars face a lie detector and are treated to a night on the town.

episodes.name: The Ultimatum
episodes.overview: Season 2 ends with the couples deciding whether they should stay together or go their separate ways.

episodes.name: Shotgun Wedding
episodes.overview: The couples are ambushed by a shotgun wedding on the first day of boot camp. Stars are blindsided by unexpected guests who object to their relationships. Kendra explodes when she is confronted by her mother.

episodes.name: Death Wish
episodes.overview: The participants are asked to play the blame game; and Travis lets Aubrey know what he thinks about her relationship with her assistant. Later, deathbed confessions prove emotional as Tami relives the past and Kendra pleads with Hank for the whole truth about the scandal that rocked their marriage.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies and Audiotape
episodes.overview: Aubrey and Travis continue to bicker; Tami and Reggie face the possibility she might be pregnant; and Kendra gives Hank an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Disorderly Courtship
episodes.overview: "Divorce Court" judge Lynn Toler gives the couples some tough love; and Kendra defends Hank when Tami comes at him with too many questions.

episodes.name: Troubled Waters
episodes.overview: The atmosphere around camp heats up and the reality stars feel pushed to the edge.

episodes.name: Dangerous Liasons
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank have a hard time working through their issues; at the same time, things get out of hand when the reality stars swap partners.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.overview: Jim and Elizabeth make progress with getting Hank to open up to Kendra.

episodes.name: The Sex Tape
episodes.overview: Elizabeth tries to help the couples focus on their issues in the bedroom; and a reality star comes close to walking out of boot camp.

episodes.name: Grave Injustice
episodes.overview: Jim helps the couples release their inner demons and darkest thoughts, including Hank, who faces his fears like never before. Meanwhile, Kendra is desperate to repair her relationship, but first needs Hank to realize that she's a victim of his lies.

episodes.name: The Long Lie
episodes.overview: The couples are challenged by Jim and Elizabeth to confront their anger and disappointments, which leads to a shocking revelation by Aubry to Travis.

episodes.name: Web of Lies
episodes.overview: The reality stars deal with the results of a lie detector test.

episodes.name: Diamonds Aren't Forever
episodes.overview: The couples consider the results of a lie detector test as they decide whether to stay together or call it quits in the Season 3 finale, which finds one participant shocked by their partner at the final ring ceremony.

episodes.name: An Affair to Remember
episodes.overview: In the Season 4 Premiere, the couples take part in a game show that reveals dark truths; and a secret affair is exposed. Later, a disturbing twist sends one of the couples home.

episodes.name: The Secret Weapon
episodes.overview: A surprise wedding takes a dark turn when tragedy strikes; and Judge Lynn Toler from "Divorce Court" teams up with Jim and Elizabeth and gets serious with the couples.

episodes.name: Dancing With the Devil
episodes.overview: The spouses swap for a sexy tango competition that spirals into a jealous rampage; and Sundy goes commando. Meanwhile, Catherine's jealousy from sharing Sean with other women on "The Bachelor" reignites.

episodes.name: The Low Blow
episodes.overview: The couples engage in a verbal boxing match; Catherine and Ink are honest with each other; and Sugar Bear is forced to come clean about his infidelities, crushing Mama June.

episodes.name: Sugar Coated Lies
episodes.overview: The couples become frustrated during a blind communication drill; Mama June has a panic attack; and Sugar Bear confesses to more infidelities. Later, an argument erupts when a secret pregnancy is revealed.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: The couples open up about their sex lives; Sean and Catherine bare it all; Sundy and Benzino's secret past is revealed; Cedric becomes infuriated; and Althea and Benzino are forced to cooperate with each other.

episodes.name: Mocked and Rocked
episodes.overview: The couples confront their traumatic pasts and work to forgive those who hurt them; Sundy reveals a childhood secret; Cedric is devastated; Catherine and Sean start to break down; and Benzino is ambushed.

episodes.name: Love and Behold
episodes.overview: Sean and Catherine fight dirty behind closed doors, leading Jim and Elizabeth to confront them about their secret. Later, tensions escalate when the couples reveal their inner demons; and Ink threatens to hurt the directors.

episodes.name: Poly-Wrath
episodes.overview: Infidelities are exposed when the couples are surprised with a lie-detector test; and Sugar Bear gets upset after being pressed for answers. Later, Catherine gets wild when the couples are given a hall pass.

episodes.name: The Broken Heart
episodes.overview: Heartbreak strikes the final ring ceremony; the couples must decide whether or not to stay together; one decision shocks the whole house; and a surprise proposal bursts into flames.

episodes.name: Taradise Lost
episodes.overview: In the fifth-season premiere, one celebrity enters boot camp alone and must go on a search for their partner. Later, the couples are surprised when Montel Williams arrives and begins revealing secrets.

episodes.name: Over My Dead Body
episodes.overview: The couples are forced to face the death of their partners; and Tara rebels after shutting down. Later, an unexpected guest reveals trouble between Cody and Michelle.

episodes.name: Loose Lips Kill Relationships
episodes.overview: Chaos ensues when the couples swap spouses; and Jim and Elizabeth are forced to intervene in a dramatic confrontation after Cody reveals a secret from Michelle's past. Later, one pair's unexpected breakup leads to divorce.

episodes.name: Memp-hitz The Fan
episodes.overview: Emotions run high during a fight exercise; someone's fidelity is questioned; Memphitz unleashes his anger on Toya; and Brittish attacks Lorenzo. Later, Tara and Dean begin to show their true colors.

episodes.name: Hit Me With Your Best Shock
episodes.overview: The couples participate in shock therapy. Later, someone reveals an infidelity; one person's forced to leave Boot Camp; and Tara and Lisa face off.

episodes.name: Puppet Master
episodes.overview: The starts get candid; sex lives exposed; Tara flees during sex drill.

episodes.name: Trainwrecking
episodes.overview: The couples confront their dark pasts. Later, Michelle reveals a painful secret; Memphitz returns from court; and Tara spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Panic in the Control Room
episodes.overview: The couples confront themselves; Michelle breaks down at the thought of her infidelity; and Dean has a breakthrough. Later, Tara has a meltdown, causing chaos in the control room.

episodes.name: Lying Up a Storm
episodes.overview: Lie-detector tests reveal shocking truths; Memphitz is blindsided; and Cody's the target of a low blow. Later, a hall pass leads to a wild night; and Tara and Dean accidentally reveal a big secret.

episodes.name: Unveil the Betrayal
episodes.overview: Secrets from a wild night are exposed; one star makes a huge decision; and a scandal is revealed. Later, one couple is kicked out of boot camp.

episodes.name: Can I Get a Witness?
episodes.overview: In the sixth-season premiere, a high-profile celebrity-gossip blogger reveals dark secrets about the couples. Later, drama erupts during divorce court; and an unexpected guest witness surprises the house.

episodes.name: The Deadly Storm
episodes.overview: The couples confront death, as a fatal crime scene leads to painful farewells. Later, Tanner shuts down; Amber panics; Storm laughs at the exercise; and Merika has an ultimatum for Margeaux.

episodes.name: Blood in the Water
episodes.overview: Drama erupts when the stars fight dirty; KeKe storms off in a tirade; Amber breaks down over Jim's belligerent drinking habits; Nikko battles to win Margeaux back.

episodes.name: Stranger Danger
episodes.overview: A social mixer leads to chaos when ideal partners are introduced to the couples. Later, some people feel jealous; Storm gets angry; and Jim argues with Dr. V.

episodes.name: Pedal to the Meddle
episodes.overview: The couples participate in a communication drill; and one couple is caught cheating. Later, Margeaux and Keke argue; Nikko and Margeaux rekindle old flames; Merika's jealousy leads to a meltdown; and Jim becomes angry with Amber.

episodes.name: I Want a Husband and a Wife!
episodes.overview: The couples talk about sex, which leads to shocking confessions. Later, Merika's furious after Margeaux reveals a desire for her ex; Keke and Margeaux get in an argument; and Amber exposes a dark secret.

episodes.name: The Weakest Link
episodes.overview: The couples reveal secrets from their dark pasts; Karen breaks down regarding her father's role in her uncle's murder; and Tanner storms off after being pushed to open up. Later, Merika hits rock bottom.

episodes.name: Black Heart Down
episodes.overview: The stars are challenged to forgive themselves. Later, Jade's pushed to the edge; Keke and Margeaux face off; and lies about a secret kiss lead to trouble.

episodes.name: Jersey House Lies
episodes.overview: The couples take lie-detector tests, which leads to secrets being exposed. Later, Karen and Amber get into a fight during a night on the town.

episodes.name: Make Merika Great Again
episodes.overview: In the sixth-season finale, chaos ensues at the ring ceremony. Later, one spouse gets cold feet; someone's partner flees the mansion; Keke learns the results of her pregnancy test; and divorce papers are served.

episodes.name: 100 Questions and Counting
episodes.overview: Reality TVs most troubled couples arrive at Boot Camp with hefty baggage including a Bachelorette & a mob wife! A surprise press conference sparks chaos when dirty laundry is exposed; one partner storms off!

episodes.name: Two of a Crime
episodes.overview: Emotions collide in a deadly car crash. Couples must say final goodbyes, but Amy wont commit and Ashley bursts into tears. A gruesome twosome wreaks havoc over Boot Camp, pushing one spouse over the edge.

episodes.name: Bust a Move
episodes.overview: Sexy spouse swap forces couples to dance outside of their relationships; Renee's injury sparks tension; Joe gets down and flirty with Amy; one spouse makes a shocking confession involving their wondering eye.

episodes.name: Children of the Scorned
episodes.overview: Surprise guests reveal dark childhood secrets. Amys traumatic upbringing; PreMadonnas intense breakthrough. A punishment brings the men to tears!

episodes.name: Let Them Eat Pie
episodes.overview: The stars dish out blame! When faced with a jury of their peers, harsh judgment comes crashing down. Bachelorette couple hits their breaking point.

episodes.name: I'm Too Sexy For My Dirt
episodes.overview: The stars get down and dirty when they reveal shocking bedroom secrets! Chaos erupts when Victor gets busted for a scandalous lie. Renee is overexposed and goes ballistic!

episodes.name: Joe Blows
episodes.overview: Shock therapy puts the couples under house arrest; traumatic pasts are exposed; Amy's faces her dad & unleashes pent-up rage; Dr. Ish and a booze-fueled Joe nearly come to blows.

episodes.name: What the Buck
episodes.overview: Things ignite when the couples must forgive their own worst enemy; inner demons are exposed; Buck unleashes his temper; Joe flirts with another woman and Renee goes ballistic.

episodes.name: Lying in Wait
episodes.overview: A surprise lie detector test drops truth bombs on the couples. Things explode when deception is indicated! A wild, single's night out on the town leads to a ferocious house fight. The cops are called!

episodes.name: You Booze, You Lose
episodes.overview: The cops are called when Joe destroys the house in a booze-fueled rage. Dirty details from a wild night out are exposed and fuel a fight between Gabi and Victor. Final ring ceremony; not every union survives!

episodes.name: Family Edition: Wreck The Halls
episodes.overview: Four reality stars and their toxic family members check into Boot Camp as a last resort. After two years of silence, Kendra and Patti face off. A surprise holiday celebration sparks a brutal confrontation.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Close Your Coffin
episodes.overview: A birthday bash takes a deadly turn; families say final goodbyes at a surprise funeral; Paula unleashes her rage while the Sorrentinos' loyal brotherhood destructs; Kendra faces her worst nightmare -- her mother.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Another Brick in the Wall
episodes.overview: The blame game hits the families like a ton of bricks in the fight to keep relationships afloat; cheaters pay the price when busted; Farrah and Debra's abuse issues erupt; and Debra's big secret is revealed.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Mama Don't Play
episodes.overview: Thanksgiving sparks family war when negative traits are scored in a brutal game of football. Later, Farrah takes a tumble; Paula gets put in a big time-out; and Debra's gone, but her secret erupts.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Can't Escape the Situation
episodes.overview: The families face their communication issues in an escape room; Marc goes ballistic; Kendra finds a daunting clue about her mom's looming tell-all book; and Farrah discovers her mom's big secret.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Ding Dong the Witch is Wed!
episodes.overview: Surprise guests shock the families, exposing dark childhood secrets from generation to generation; Marc finally cracks; Kendra continues to feel unloved; Debra returns and drama explodes.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Mamageddon
episodes.overview: A surprise lie detector test sparks chaos; Paula and Farrah nearly come to blows; Kendra threatens to leave; things spiral out of control, bringing the Boot Camp to its knees.

episodes.name: Family Edition: The F Bomb
episodes.overview: A brutal confrontation rages on and shuts down boot camp; lie detector shocks all; one boot camper is busted for cheating; families face final decision to mend or end their toxic ties forever.

episodes.name: Becky With the Good Hair
episodes.overview: Reality TV's most explosive couples rock Boot Camp, including a Teen Mom and a powder keg duo from Shahs of Sunset; a "shock" gun wedding sparks chaos; a divorce bombshell and a surprise guest shocks all!.

episodes.name: Murder He Wrote
episodes.overview: With their relationships on life support, the couples stare death in the face when forced to pull the plug on their partners; a brutally honest letter to widowed single mother Juelia comes back to haunt JJ.

episodes.name: Great Balls of Blame
episodes.overview: Asifa exposes Bobby's dirty laundry, and Kailyn and Javi fight over infidelity and child support.

episodes.name: Single and Ready to Strangle
episodes.overview: Jealousy and infidelity run rampant when  the couples are forced to watch their partners flirt at a singles mixer. Meanwhile, Mehgan goes ballistic when DeAndre crosses the line, and Amina finds comfort in a stranger.

episodes.name: Man Overboard
episodes.overview: A blindfolded paddle board race forces the couples to navigate the treacherous waters of communication; Kailyn and Javi come to blows; Javi is pushed to his breaking point and jumps ship.

episodes.name: There's No Crying in Threesomes!
episodes.overview: Puppet therapy turns kinky when the stars get candid and expose their sex lives; Peter gets caught in the act with his ex, Tara; Asifa and Bobby's heated fight leads to the biggest exit in Boot Camp history.

episodes.name: Prison Breakdown
episodes.overview: The stars are sent to the slammer when a lesson in forgiveness sparks a rebellion; a prison break in the house leads to the biggest shut down in Boot Camp history.

episodes.name: Playing With Fire
episodes.overview: The couples come to blows with their own worst enemy: themselves; teen Mom Kailyn and Javi's child support war ignites; a standoff between Love & Hip Hop's Peter and Amina sparks a firestorm.

episodes.name: Pretty Little Liars
episodes.overview: A surprise lie detector test wreaks havoc in the house; one couple tries to flee the house to dodge questions about a cheating scandal; a singles night out on the town leads to a booze-fueled disaster.

episodes.name: The Ex-orcism
episodes.overview: The ring ceremony leads to shocking decisions, heartache and divorce papers; an unexpected guest derails one couple's trip to the alter and wreaks havoc in the house.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Show and Hell
episodes.overview: The families go back to kindergarten for a surprise show and tell; the class spirals out of control as deep issues are exposed; Amber goes on a rampage that sparks a brutal confrontation with the Jones family.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Snake in the Grass
episodes.overview: The family members must confess their deepest truths or suffer a terrifying punishment; Chrissy breaks down in tears; Amber and Matt's checkered past rears its ugly head; Renee unleashes years of pent-up rage on her sisters.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Who Let the Dogs Out?
episodes.overview: The family members must make the ultimate sacrifice for their loved ones by completing a terrifying task; Amber confronts Brandi about her drinking; things explode between Chrissy and Mama Jones.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Rose All Day
episodes.overview: A Thanksgiving celebration goes rogue when the cast members swap families; Matt ends up in the hot seat, while Renee has a shocking setback; after a trip to the hospital, Brandi sits on Jim's lap, causing battle lines to be drawn.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Boot Camping
episodes.overview: A lock-out forces the families to maneuver their way back into the house; Renee battles her addiction; Brandi pays the price for sitting on Jim's lap; a chilling task pushes the Joneses over the edge.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Come Hell or High Water
episodes.overview: The families navigate the dangerous waters of communication; Renee goes to Narcotics Anonymous; Amber and Tonya run out of their medications; panic strikes when a Boot Camper suffers a health crisis and collapses.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Scrooged and Abused
episodes.overview: Childhood traumas resurface during a Boot Camp Christmas. Surprise guests rock the house. Matt breaks down when he exposes a shocking event from his past. Renee goes ballistic when she gets a glimpse into the future without her sister, Jenn.

episodes.name: Family Edition: Don't Hate, Participate
episodes.overview: The families unleash their inner demons; Renee has an emotional breakthrough with her sisters; Amber and Matt nearly come to blows and call it quits; the Jones family rebels and Mama goes ballistic.

episodes.name: Family Edition: The Last Lie
episodes.overview: Amber pursues Matt after he runs out of the house on lie detector day; Lana refuses to take the polygraph test; Tonya is tested for drug abuse; Jim and Chrissy get into a heated argument.

episodes.name: Family Edition: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: The families make their final decisions, but not all survive; Mama Jones exposes a shocking family secret; Amber and Brandi nearly come to blows in one last showdown; Jenn makes an unexpected decision regarding her sisters; Renee is crushed.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Prom Night
episodes.overview: Five new couples enter Boot Camp and quickly learn that there is no dancing around their issues when they are brought back to their prom night with a shocking twist. A brutal confrontation breaks out! The doctors, security and producers come running!

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Check Your Baggage
episodes.overview: The couples dig up their baggage but shovel up more than what they bargained for; Pauly and Aubrey fight over cheating allegations; Quani struggles with her affections and breaks down; Ernest suffers a medical emergency.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Death Wish
episodes.overview: The couples must confess their darkest truths or face punishment; a death wish rocks one couple to the core; a truth bomb puts Momma Dee and Ernest on the verge of another divorce; Kim checks Aubrey; Pauly D is ready to flee the house.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Love Shock
episodes.overview: The couples undergo shock therapy to identify what triggers their blow ups; picture-perfect Chris and Desiree start to show cracks in their armor; Kim's alarming behavior worsens; Ernest runs to Momma's aid during a trauma; Pauly D is pushed too far.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Drunk in Love
episodes.overview: After Aubrey's death wish, Pauly D escapes the Boot Camp house without a trace; Ernest is sent to urgent care; the couples navigate a communication course while wearing drunk goggles; Chris gets the wrath of Judge Toler when he crosses the line.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Talk Dirty to Me
episodes.overview: The couples uncover their issues in the bedroom; wild fantasies and sexy secrets are exposed during a game of truth or dare; Puma and Quani clash over intimacy, while Chris shuts down dirty talk with Desiree; Kim shocks all with a sex confession.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Night Terrors
episodes.overview: The couples take a trip down memory lane to discover what is haunting their current relationships; the couples are blind-sided as their pasts become their worst nightmares; Chris gets burned for not opening up; a surprise guest wreaks havoc.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Ice Ice Baby
episodes.overview: The couples must sacrifice themselves or their partner in an unpleasant task; when faced with bone-chilling waters and flaming hot coals, the consequences are brutal; Wynn's decision puts him and Kim on ice; Aubrey and Pauly's drama ignites.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Bachelor Secret Revealed!
episodes.overview: The couples sweat it out in the hot seat during a surprise lie detector test; Desiree must answer the biggest question in Bachelor history; all hell breaks loose when deception is indicated; a singles night out on the town leads to trouble.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: End of the Road
episodes.overview: After an explosive lie detector test, Chris makes a last-ditch effort to save his relationship; at the final ring ceremony, not every couple survives; Puma pulls a prank on Quani that backfires; a devastating breakup shocks all.

episodes.name: Lovers & Liars: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: Dr. Ish and Dr. V along with the shows producers go behind-the-scenes of the most explosive season ever! Shocking secrets exposed, including the dramatic manhunt after Pauly Ds escape and the most explosive bachelor breakdown in Boot Camp history.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: It Ain't All Gucci
episodes.overview: Five of hip-hops hottest couples enter Boot Camp, and exes reunite; the couples are blind-sided when the VIP club flips into Divorce Court; shocking issues are exposed; the couples receive an unpleasant surprise.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Drop It Like It's Hot
episodes.overview: The stars go head-to-head over who's to blame in an epic rap battle. Nia drops a bomb on Soulja Boy and all hell breaks loose! The stars sweat it out in the hot seat when they are served a plate of their burning issues. A battle of the exes ignites.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Road Rage
episodes.overview: The stars navigate the hazards of dominance; a controlling Soulja Boy drives Nia over the edge; Lil' Fizz and Tiffany take an unexpected turn; Waka Flocka and Tammy crash and burn over past issues of infidelity.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Hashtag Drama
episodes.overview: The stars are put on blast when a surprise press conference digs up dirty laundry from their social media; later, the couples are ambushed by a wife swap; jealousy wreaks havoc when old flames Lil' Fizz and Nia reconnect.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Mazed and Confused
episodes.overview: When a stressful communication drill fails, the doctors confront the smoking issue; Tiffany seeks answers from Fizz and Nia; Soulja Boy is left feeling under water; a boot camper is caught on camera face-timing someone other than his or her partner.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Sex, Lies & Facetime
episodes.overview: The couples learn that Sex Day is not all fun and games when one person is caught Facetiming someone other than his or her partner; Soulja lets jealousy get the best of him, leaving Nia wanting to go home alone; Lil' Mo wonders what Karl is hiding.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Breaking Bad
episodes.overview: After Karl is caught FaceTiming another woman, Lil' Mo demands answers; special guests force the couples to confront their traumatic pasts; drama erupts when Nia encounters Soulja's problem child.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Mo Honey, Mo Problems
episodes.overview: The couples face a dangerous challenge in an ultimate test of sacrifice; an explosive blowup shakes Soulja and Nia to their cores; Lil Mo gets revenge on Karl for FaceTiming another woman; Tiffany feels abandoned when Fizz stings her heart.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Lyin' Dirty
episodes.overview: The couples sweat it out in the hot seat during a surprise lie detector test and deception is indicated; the stars hit the club for a single's night out where temptation strikes at every turn and someone gets caught in the act.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Re-lit or Quit
episodes.overview: After 10 days of Boot Camp, the couples must decide if they'll stay together; Lil' Mo may have had enough of Karl's lies; Soulja Boy may pop the question; after Jessica's deception, she and Shawne choose between leaving engaged or enraged.

episodes.name: Caution, Family Secrets Ahead
episodes.overview: Four dysfunctional celebrity families enter Boot Camp and come face-to-face with the secrets that broke them; singer Aaron Carter and actor Corey Feldman seek to reconcile their childhoods stolen by fame.

episodes.name: The Pop Star Always Wins
episodes.overview: A trip to an amusement park gets heated when the families play the blame game; while Alexis refuses to take aim, Jane has Corey in her crosshairs, and Aaron is shocked by his mothers true feelings; when called out by the doctors, Alexis flees.

episodes.name: Family Lock Up
episodes.overview: Boot Camp directors Jim and Elizabeth Carroll, joined by co-directors Ilsa Norman and David Bishop, are up against the most explosive and challenging Marriage Boot Camp, yet, with high octane drills such as a shotgun wedding and pulling the plug on someone you love. In the end, the reality stars will be forced to make a final decision; is their union worth saving or are they better off apart? And when secrets and lies are finally exposed, it leaves everyone shocked and futures in doubt.

episodes.name: Off the Deep End
episodes.overview: An emergency at Boot Camp causes resentment letters to resurface forcing the families to face past hurts; Corey and Courtney lock Eden out of their bedroom.

episodes.name: Wet and Whining
episodes.overview: The boot campers are locked out of the house for a day of camping; when family dysfunctions emerge, the campers are surprised by a geyser; they must work together to get back in; Corey feels picked on by the doctors and the other housemates.

episodes.name: Lost at Sea
episodes.overview: The families navigate the treacherous waters of communication in order to save a loved one; Courtney is left stranded when Corey and Eden quit.

episodes.name: Cycling Through the Past
episodes.overview: Surprise guests cause old traumas to resurface; Corey continues to dismiss Eden's feelings; Aaron admits he should've gotten emancipated as a teen.

episodes.name: Dogged Pursuit
episodes.overview: The families make the ultimate sacrifice for their loved ones by undergoing a brutal attack; Eden finds comfort with another boot camper.

episodes.name: Burning Question
episodes.overview: The families face a surprise lie detector test; Aaron finally gets the hard truth; Alexis shuts down; Corey threatens to leave.

episodes.name: The Last Resort
episodes.overview: The celebrity families face the final decision day; Aaron and Corey reel from the lie detector test; a dark secret rocks one family.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Hashtag Not Winning
episodes.overview: Five of hip hops hottest couples enter Marriage Boot Camp & reveal shocking relationship secrets. Dr. Ish & Judge Toler throw down harsh truths, but a surprising twist leaves all the couples blindsided.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Drop the Mic
episodes.overview: Hip-hop couples face off in an epic rap battle exposing their toxic blame; Judge Toler confronts the boot campers's biggest issues; Michel'le makes a shocking revelation about Stew that rocks the house.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Bae Watch
episodes.overview: Chozus' mystery call sends Bianca into a rage; things get heated when Joseline confronts Bianca; a pool party sparks jealousy when Balistic reaches his breaking point; a major blowup erupts.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Shock to the System
episodes.overview: Boot camp couples reveal shocking and painful truths; Styles P reaches a breaking point with wife Adjua; Michel'le comes clean, forcing Stew to question their entire relationship.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Dirty Little Secrets
Hip Hop Edition: Boot Camp Betrayal
episodes.overview: A shocking betrayal divides the boot camp. For the first time, Dr. Ish gives the power to vote in a first-ever house elimination. A challenging task leads to an explosive communication breakdown.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: The Naked Truth
episodes.overview: The boot campers spill shocking sex secrets and intimacy issues are exposed; Joseline breaks down in a dramatic custody battle for her daughter; weakest couple questions their future; affair resurfaces that could tear a relationship apart.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Scarred Pasts
episodes.overview: The campers divulge surprising traumas when they have to confront their childhood scars; Michelle struggles to face her past and wonders about her rocky relationship with Stew.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Love the Way You Lie
Hip Hop Edition: Put a Ring on It
Electing to Face the Music
episodes.overview: Five hip-hop couples enter Boot Camp and expose shocking secrets; Dr. Ish and Judge Toler push the campers to face their biggest issues in a heated debate; an explosive fight erupts and flips the house upside-down.

episodes.name: Drama Said Knock You Out
episodes.overview: An epic rap battle exposes the couples' shocking resentment issues; Kurupt's struggle with self-control leads to an epic fail that stuns the house and could end his relationship; Hazel-E and Tahiry face off.

episodes.name: Swap It like it's hot
episodes.overview: Jealousy strikes when the they break out their sexiest dance moves; an explosive fight.

episodes.name: Pod Clash
episodes.overview: The couples are divided during a podcast when Clinton Sparks gets the Boot Campers to open up.

episodes.name: Hard Shock Life
episodes.overview: Boot campers battle with communication issues when they cant escape a drill. Willies surprising confession stuns Shanda. Shock therapy triggers the couples when hard truths are exposed. Vados shocking meltdown turns the house upside down.

episodes.name: Luv Ya Self
episodes.overview: Vado's shocking outburst rocks the house and forces Dr. Ish to make a difficult decision; when the couples reveal their deepest insecurities, it leads to surprising breakthroughs; Toni's devastating discovery threatens her relationship with Kurupt.

episodes.name: Talk Dirty to Me
episodes.overview: The Boot Campers spill their shocking sex secrets & flip the house upside down. Dr. Ish makes a decision that stuns the couples. Kurupts behavior pushes Toni to a breaking point. A trip to the hospital results in a devastating discovery.

episodes.name: Break the Cycle
episodes.overview: The Boot Campers confront their past and expose shocking childhood traumas; Tahiry struggles with Vado's return to the house; when Kurupt reaches a breaking point, Dr. Ish and Judge Toler make a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: The lie detector test sparks chaos and threatens to tear the couples apart; Ish grants hall passes.

episodes.name: Vow Or Never
episodes.overview: The lie detector results wreak havoc on the house; couples are forced to make their final decisions.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Edition: Lovers on Lockdown
episodes.overview: Four new couples enter the Boot Camp house and identify the problems plaguing their relationships. Tempers fly when Dr. Ish and Judge Toler dig deep and get close to one couple's core issue.

episodes.name: PUBLIC ENEMIES
episodes.overview: The couples face their public personas; Siir Brock confronts Mally Mall when hes dissed.

episodes.name: Speak of the Devil
episodes.overview: Hip hop couples compete in a race. Communication drills sparks drama when one boot camper threatens to leave. N.O.R.E.'s temper flares when he loses control. Tresure breaks down, spiraling Mally into chaos.

episodes.name: High on Mally
episodes.overview: It's sex day and the couples open up about their sex lives. Monie and Tuff have a major breakthrough. One couple reveals a massive secret that is so explosive, it turns the house upside down.

episodes.name: Diss-respect
episodes.overview: The couples must re-enact their worst fights on Respect Day. An unwelcome surprise shocks the boot campers. Monie Love breaks down when forced to confront her painful past with Tuff.

episodes.name: Breaking The Cycle
episodes.overview: Tears are shed when the boot-campers learn how their childhood shaped them into who they are today.

episodes.name: All Lies On Me
episodes.overview: The couples take a lie detector test to determine whether they're being truthful to their partners about the core issue in their relationship. Drama erupts when they learn that, for the first time in history, at least one person lied in each couple.

episodes.name: Put A Ring On It?
episodes.overview: Hip-hop couples decide to stay together or break apart after shocking lie detector results.

episodes.name: Welcome to Boot Camp
episodes.overview: Four wild couples join the Boot Camp; Dr. Ish and Judge Toler try to mend broken relationships.

episodes.name: That's A Wrap
episodes.overview: Its rap battle day! The couples rap about what they resent about one another. Things get even spicier, when they are forced to eat their pain. But when the boot campers refused to show up, Judge Toler is ready to drop down the law.

episodes.name: Poison Envy
episodes.overview: Jealousy is lit when Dr. Ish has the Boot Campers swap romantic partners for the day to perform a sexy dance. A1 is caught in the middle when Lyrica and K Michelles past feud resurfaces, and Boo shows a side that no one expects.

episodes.name: All Shook Up
episodes.overview: The couples must learn to fight fair, but when Lyrica and A1 try to switch up the game, everybody pays a shocking price. Emmet gets heated when Boo crosses the line with his family. K Michelle puts her foot down on having a new baby.

episodes.name: Fail To Communicate
episodes.overview: Couples battle communication. A1 & Lyrica bend the rules, frustrating their fellow boot campers. K. Michelle & Lyrica reignite an old feud with an explosive fight that rocks the house. Mariahlynn shares a painful past. Boo & Emmet lose patience.

episodes.name: Diss-Respectful
episodes.overview: Tensions boil over between K. Michelle and Lyrica, as the couples learn how words can damage a relationship. Ish and the Judge have some big surprises in store that will teach everyone the true meaning of respect.
